## R-package [RgoogleMaps](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RgoogleMaps/index.html)

```{r,eval=Ex}
library(RgoogleMaps)
newmap <- GetMap(center = c(52.52001,13.40495), zoom = 14, 
                 destfile = "Berlin.png", 
                 maptype = "satellite")
PlotOnStaticMap(newmap)
?bubbleMap
```

## googleVis

```{r,eval=Ex}

library(googleVis)

data(Exports)    # a simple data frame
Geo <- gvisGeoMap(Exports, locationvar="Country", 
numvar="Profit",options=list(height=400, 
dataMode='regions'))
plot(Geo)
```

## plotting Andrew

```{r,eval=Ex}
data(Andrew)
M1 <- gvisMap(Andrew, "LatLong", "Tip", 
              options=list(showTip=TRUE, showLine=F, 
enableScrollWheel=TRUE, mapType='satellite', 
useMapTypeControl=TRUE, width=800,height=400))
plot(M1)
```

## rworldmap

```{r,eval=Ex}
library(rworldmap)
# different resolutions available
newmap <- getMap(resolution = "coarse")  
plot(newmap)
```

## Vignette

```{r,eval=Ex}
library(rworldmap)
vignette('rworldmap')
mapCountryData()
```

## Package dismo

[dismo](http://vijaybarve.files.wordpress.com/2012/07/dan_chr3.png)

```{r}

mymap <- gmap("France")  # choose whatever country

```
